options.content:
Hitachi Vantara
# # # Storages (${storageSystemId})

targets.query: SELECT "seqReadIOPS" FROM "hvIops.1" WHERE ("storageSystemId"::tag =~ /^$storageSystemId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "seqReadIOPS" FROM "hvIops.1" WHERE ("storageSystemId"::tag =~ /^$storageSystemId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT "seqReadIOPS" FROM "hvIops.1" WHERE ("storageSystemId"::tag =~ /^$storageSystemId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "hvMpUtilization.1"
SELECT "transferRate" FROM "hvPortTransfer.1" WHERE ("storageSystemId"::tag =~ /^$storageSystemId$/ AND "transferRate" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "port"::tag
SELECT "port", LAST("totalIOPS") AS "totalIOPS" FROM "hvPortIOPS.1" WHERE ("storageSystemId"::tag =~ /^$storageSystemId$/ AND "totalIOPS"::field > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "port"::tag LIMIT 10
SELECT mean("value") FROM "hvMpbUtilization.1"
SELECT "seqReadIOPS" FROM "hvIops.1" WHERE ("storageSystemId"::tag =~ /^$storageSystemId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
  floor(last("availableCapacityInBytes") / 1024 + 0.5) AS "Free", 
  floor("capacityInBytes" / 1024 + 0.5) AS "Total", 
  floor("usedCapacityInBytes" / 1024 + 0.5) AS "Used" 
FROM "hvPools.2" 
WHERE ("storageSystemId"::tag =~ /^$storageSystemId$/) 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY "storageSystemId"::tag, "storagePoolId"::tag
SELECT "seqReadIOPS" FROM "hvIops.1" WHERE ("storageSystemId"::tag =~ /^$storageSystemId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
